workflow.name: Zendesk pending ticket follow-up system with Gmail, Google Sheets & ClickUp
workflow.description:
##  Description
Automate Zendesk ticket follow-up management by fetching pending tickets daily, enriching and logging them into Google Sheets, creating ClickUp tasks for team reminders, and sending professional follow-up emails to customers. Keeps your support pipeline clean and ensures no pending tickets fall through the cracks. üé´üìäüìß‚úÖ

## What This Template Does
- Triggers daily (Mon‚ÄìFri at 8 PM) to check Zendesk for pending tickets. ‚è∞
- Filters only "pending" status tickets to reduce noise. üîç
- Formats ticket data with priority, age, and attention flags. üß†
- Logs all tickets into Google Sheets for reporting and analytics. üìä
- Creates ClickUp tasks for team follow-up and accountability. üìã
- Generates professional HTML follow-up emails grouped by customer. üé®
- Sends emails via Gmail with ticket details and next steps. üìß

## Key Benefits
- Ensures no pending Zendesk tickets are forgotten. ‚è±Ô∏è
- Builds a historical log for analytics and audit trails. üßæ
- Keeps your support team accountable with ClickUp tasks. ‚úÖ
- Delivers personalized, branded follow-up emails to customers. üí°
- Reduces manual effort in tracking and responding to tickets. üîÑ

## Features
- Schedule Trigger ‚Äì Runs Mon‚ÄìFri at 8:00 PM. üóìÔ∏è
- Zendesk Integration ‚Äì Fetches pending tickets automatically. üé´
- Smart Data Processing ‚Äì Cleans descriptions, calculates age, flags urgent tickets. ‚ö°
- Google Sheets Logging ‚Äì Maintains a structured log with Ticket ID, URL, tags, status, etc. üìà
- ClickUp Tasks ‚Äì Automatically creates tasks per pending ticket. üìã
- Email Generation ‚Äì Groups tickets per customer, builds professional HTML follow-ups. üé®
- Gmail Delivery ‚Äì Sends personalized follow-ups directly to customers. üìß

## Requirements
- n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted).
- Zendesk API credentials with read access.
- Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials with write access.
- ClickUp API credentials for task creation.
- Gmail OAuth2 credentials for sending emails.
- Pre-configured Google Sheet for pending ticket tracking.

## Target Audience
- Customer support teams managing Zendesk tickets. üéß
- SaaS companies wanting automated follow-ups. üöÄ
- CS managers ensuring accountability in ticket handling. üõ†Ô∏è
- SMBs reducing customer wait time with proactive follow-ups. üè¢
- Remote support teams needing automated reminders and logs. üåê

## Step-by-Step Setup Instructions

- Connect Zendesk, Google Sheets, ClickUp, and Gmail credentials in n8n. üîë
- Update the schedule trigger (default: Mon‚ÄìFri at 8:00 PM). ‚è∞
- Replace the Google Sheet ID with your pending ticket log sheet. üìä
- Configure your ClickUp space/list IDs for task creation. üìã
- Update email branding and sender address in the email generator. üé®
- Test with sample tickets to validate Sheets logging, ClickUp tasks, and Gmail delivery. ‚úÖ

workflow.name: Automate follow-ups for pending tickets in Zendesk

parameters.content:
## üéØ Workflow Overview

This workflow automates Zendesk support ticket management:
- Fetches pending tickets daily
- Logs them to Google Sheets for tracking
- Sends follow-up emails to customers
- Creates ClickUp tasks for team reminders

**Schedule**: Runs Monday-Friday at 8 PM

## üìä Data Retrieval

Fetches all pending tickets from Zendesk using the API.

**Configuration Required**:
- Zendesk API credentials
- Filter: status = 'pending'
- Returns all matching tickets

## üîç Smart Filtering

Filters tickets based on status and age:
- Only processes 'pending' status tickets
- Helps reduce noise and focus on actionable items

**Logic**: status === 'pending'

## üõ†Ô∏è Data Processing

Formats and enriches ticket data:
- Standardizes field names
- Calculates ticket age and priority levels
- Adds computed fields for better analysis
- Prepares data for downstream nodes

## üìä Data Logging

Logs formatted ticket data to Google Sheets:
- Maintains historical record
- Enables reporting and analytics
- Updates existing tickets or creates new entries
- Uses Ticket ID as matching column

## ‚úÖ Task Management

Creates ClickUp tasks for ticket tracking:
- One task per pending ticket
- Due date based on ticket priority
- Tags from Zendesk are preserved
- Helps team track follow-ups

## üìß Email Generation

Generates personalized follow-up emails:
- Groups tickets by customer email
- Creates professional HTML emails
- Includes ticket details and next steps
- Maintains brand consistency

## üì§ Email Delivery

Sends professional follow-up emails via Gmail:
- Uses HTML formatted emails
- Personalizes content per customer
- Includes all relevant ticket information
- Maintains professional branding

**Requires**: Gmail OAuth2 credentials

parameters.message: Follow-up on your pending support request. Please check the detailed information in the HTML version of this email.

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details: The Cron node uses Cron under the hood - a time-based job scheduler in Unix-like computer operating systems. Use this node when you want to trigger workflows periodically, especially in more complex scenarios like "every Tuesday at 9 am" or "Weekdays".

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
